Description: Papyri written with black ink with demotic legal documents. 10079 D (left in the photograph). Writing on recto only, palimpsest (original text now illegible). Dated to month of Phaophi of year 4 of Harmakhis. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Agreement as to an inheritance between Wsr-wr (Osoeris) son of Pylws with his half-sister Tanofer daughter of P-sen-Min and Pana another son of Pylws. scribe. Peteese son of Pa-h (Paes)". 10079 A (right in the photograph). Writing on recto only. Undated but shortly before D. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Oath made by Panas son of Pylws as part of the proceedings which led to the agreement D". 10079 B-C (centre in the photograph). Writing on recto only. Undated but contemporary with P BM EA 10074. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Oath in double form (exterior & interior) made by Panofer called Pekusis in connexion with the divorce no.10074".
Curator's comments: "Publ. Reich u.s.(D) p.70 pl X, (A) p. bs(?) pl. IX, (B&C) p. 51-56 pl. VIII; and for B.C. cf. Spiegelberg. moff(?) aus d. Bad. pap. samml. i. p.g." Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Reich 1914 / Papyri juistischen Inhalts in hieratischer und demotischer Schrift aus dem British Museum (A: p.68-70, pl.9)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963a / Die demotischen Tempeleide I: Text (p.89-92)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963b / Die demotischen Tempeleide II: Abbildungen (p.35)
